lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: How did Sam get his money back?
lyrics.translation: 萨姆是怎么拿回他的钱的？

lyrics.text: The whole village soon learnt that a large sum of money had been lost.
lyrics.translation: 很快，全村的人都知道有一大笔钱丢失了。

lyrics.text: Sam Benton, the local butcher, had lost his wallet while taking his savings to the post office.
lyrics.translation: 当地屠夫山姆·本顿在把积蓄拿到邮局的途中丢失了钱包。

lyrics.text: Sam was sure that the wallet must have been found by one of the villagers, but it was not returned to him.
lyrics.translation: 萨姆确信钱包一定是被村民中的一个找到了，但是并没有归还给他。

lyrics.text: Three months passed and then one morning Sam found his wallet outside his front door.
lyrics.translation: 三个月过去了，然后一天早晨，山姆发现他的钱包在他的前门外。

lyrics.text: It had been wrapped up in newspaper and it contained half the money he had lost, together with a note which said,
lyrics.translation: 它被报纸包裹着，里面装着他丢失的一半钱，还有一张纸条，上面写着，

lyrics.text: A thief, yes, but only 50% a thief.
lyrics.translation: 一个小偷，是的，但只是50%的小偷。

lyrics.text: Two months later, some more money was sent to Sam with another note.
lyrics.translation: 两个月后，更多的钱连同另一张纸条被寄给了萨姆。

lyrics.text: In time, all Sam's money was paid back in this way.
lyrics.translation: 最终，萨姆所有的钱都以这种方式被还清了。

lyrics.text: The last note said, I am 100% honest now.
lyrics.translation: 最后一条信息说，我现在百分之百诚实。
